arts.ttl: Atlético release damning statement in response to Barcelona registering Dani Olmo & Pau Víctor

arts.ttl: Marseille blame Lens for Pau Lopez loan collapse
arts.sum: In a club statement released on Thursday, Olympique de Marseille have made clear their stance on the recent failed loan move of Pau Lopez (30) to Lens. The Spaniard had…

arts.ttl: Watch: Barcelona president Laporta’s passionate reaction to news of Dani Olmo & Pau Víctor registrations

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick & Lamine Yamal react to news of Dani Olmo & Pau Víctor registrations

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick happy after Barcelona allowed to register Dani Olmo and Pau Victor
arts.sum: Olmo and Victor were both named in Barcelona’s Super Cup party, but were not listed in Wednesday’s matchday squad.

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona receive green light to register Dani Olmo & Pau Víctor
